page.title: 05School Nurse
page.content: The school health service is an important part of the 'education service'. The school nurse who serves Swimbridge and other schools in the area lives in the village. Jane Eno has been a school nurse for nearly six years following a number of years as a District Nurse. {She is responsible for children's {overall health and carries out regular {checks of speech, hair, hearing, {vision and eye-sight. Mrs. Eno covers a wide area of North Devon from Swimbridge to Winkleigh and Chulmleigh schools, covering an age range of 5-16 years. { She says she enjoys her job as it {allows her to get to know 'her' {children right through their school {career.
